title: Flexpoint Sensor Systems, Inc. Announces Widespread Availability of New USB Sensor Kit
text:
DRAPER, Utah Flexpoint Sensor Systems, Inc. ( FLXT ) today announced the release and availability of their new USB Bend Sensor ® Kit. The Kit, which is available for ordering from the company website - www.flexpoint.com - will enable engineers and product developers to start integrating the Flexpoint Bend Sensor ® into their products within minutes. The USB Bend Sensor ® Kit includes a circuit board that interfaces the Bend Sensor ® directly to a laptop or desktop PC through a USB port. Using the Flexpoint Bend Sensor ® Viewer, BSV, free downloadable software from Flexpoint's website, the user can view the waveforms in real-time as the Bend Sensor ® moves. Flexpoint provides source code for both the PC software and the firmware on the circuit board along with schematics.
Paul Sexauer , V.P. of Sales and Marketing for Flexpoint stated, "I am excited to have this kit available. This kit should help accelerate the time to market for designers and give them a starting point for integrating the Bend Sensor ® into complex electrical and mechanical systems. The product will open new avenues for product development and sales as more companies learn how to integrate the Bend Sensor ® technology into their products."
Please visit www.flexpoint.com/sdk for more information.
About Flexpoint Sensor Systems, Inc.
Flexpoint Sensor Systems, Inc. (FLXT) is an innovative technology firm specializing in developing products that feature the Company's patented Bend Sensor ® and related technology. The Bend Sensor ® is a groundbreaking sensing solution that is revolutionizing applications in the automotive, safety, medical and industrial industries. The Bend Sensor's single-layer, thin film construction cuts costs and mechanical bulk while introducing a range of functions and stylistic design possibilities that have never before been available in sensing technology. Flexpoint's technology and expertise have been recognized by the world's elite business and academic innovators for over 17 years. The company is setting a new standard for sensing solutions in the "smart" age of technology.
